web_snippets: Author Greta Boris is a master murder mystery storyteller. She combines intrigue and suspense with believable characters packed in a plot that is intense ...
Greta Boris is the USA Today Bestselling author of The Mortician Murders, a paranormal suspense series, and the soon to be released Almost True Crime Series.
Greta Boris is a USA Today Bestselling Author of mystery and suspense. Her Seven Deadly Sins series has been called atmospheric and unputdownable.
